## CustomizableOptionInterface interface

The CustomizableOptionInterface contains basic information about a customizable option. It can be implemented by several types of configurable options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomizableOptionInterface 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [option\_id?](./magento-api.customizableoptioninterface.option_id.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Option ID. |
|  [required?](./magento-api.customizableoptioninterface.required.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Boolean'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates whether the option is required. |
|  [sort\_order?](./magento-api.customizableoptioninterface.sort_order.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Int'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The order in which the option is displayed. |
|  [title?](./magento-api.customizableoptioninterface.title.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['String'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The display name for this option. |
|  [uid](./magento-api.customizableoptioninterface.uid.md) | Scalars\['ID'\] | The unique ID for a <code>CustomizableOptionInterface</code> object. |
